headline: Is Textron (TXT) Quietly Resetting Its Risk‑Reward Profile With New Guidance, Buybacks and Board Shift?
summary: Textron Inc. recently reported fourth-quarter 2025 results showing revenue of US$4,175 million and net income of US$235 million, issued 2026 guidance, completed a US$2.44 billion share repurchase program, and announced the upcoming addition of Otis CFO Cristina Méndez to its board on February 15, 2026.
